resources.string: For this application to work properly it is necessary to grant the requested permissions.
For this application to work properly it is necessary to grant the requested permissions. Please enable this in your application settings.
Enter the activation pin of the new devise (Get a PIN from https://app.smsforall.org)
You will shortly receive an SMS confirming the status of the device
The device was activated correctly, enjoy smsforall.org
The code is invalid or the device has been previously activated
An error occurred when validating the pin
An error occurred when validating the device, please check that the device is connected to a valid telephone network and that it has an SMS sending plan
In case you receive the error more than twice, we suggest you uninstall and reinstall the application
